Donations.transparency: Every euro raised is channelled with full transparency through the La Vida es Xula Association. Of everything collected, 90% goes entirely towards covering the care Esther needs, and the remaining 10% supports the Oncology Department of public hospitals. Your contribution, no matter how small it may seem, makes a huge difference. Join us and let's keep Esther smiling together!

EstherDescription.title: Who is Esther?
EstherDescription.bio: Esther is 48 years old, cheerful, fun, loving, sociable, somewhat nervous and restless. She loves paddle tennis, the sea, and cats... but because of Huntington's disease, she cannot enjoy some of her favorite hobbies. And little by little, this disease will not let her enjoy any of them.
EstherDescription.quote: Our goal is for Esther to keep enjoying every day surrounded by love and joy.
EstherDescription.disease: It is a hereditary degenerative disease with different stages, with the final one being much harder, as she may find herself unable to communicate and bedridden. Currently, there is no cure, so all we can do is take care of Esther so she feels loved and supported by all of us.
EstherDescription.costs: This care requires increasingly significant financial contributions because it becomes more specific and demanding over time.
EstherDescription.event: That is why we are organizing the 4th edition of the Todos X Esther charity tournament to raise money for this cause. 90% of the money raised will be donated to Esther's care.

FAQs.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQs.a1: You can help us in many ways: making a donation to IBAN ES93 21000423990200552994, joining the raffle, signing up for the tournament, or through the "pala 0" option (paying the tournament fee without participating). Any help, no matter how small, is welcome.
FAQs.q2: When and where is the tournament held?
FAQs.a2: The tournament takes place from April 20 to 26 at the Club Esportiu Valldoreix facilities.
FAQs.q3: What schedule will the tournament have? What if I cannot play at a specific time?
FAQs.a3: Do not worry about the schedule; participants' availability is considered and it is made flexible so you can take part. You will be able to indicate time slots when you are unavailable and every effort will be made to adapt.
FAQs.q4: Can I participate if I am a beginner or have no experience in padel or tennis?
FAQs.a4: There are categories for all levels, from beginners to advanced. If you have no experience and are not comfortable playing but still want to contribute, you can always join the "pala 0" option (paying the tournament fee without participating).
FAQs.q5: Can I attend the event without playing in the tournament?
FAQs.a5: Of course, everyone is welcome. These days will be full of activities, raffles, music, food and drink. We encourage you to come enjoy the event and support the cause.
FAQs.q6: How do I take part in the raffle?
FAQs.a6: Raffle tickets can be purchased in person during the event. The raffle will be held on the last day and winners will be announced in person.
